text: Nagawaga gampatile mawanga, nikuti nombe wandu waneo pakwete pagapatile mawanga ganti chisawu gelega, sano galakwego ni masiku gatukugagalausyagalausya chilikati cha wandu (lelo kwajendela ichindu chenene wane malawi nikwisa kwajendela chenene wane), soni Allah (atesile yalakweyi) kuti waamanyukule wandu wakulupilile (kusyesyene, pangatila pa ngondojo), nikuti soni watende wane mwa jemanja kuwa wakuwila pa ngondo ja dini, sano Allah jwangaanonyela wakulitenda lupuso
